title: internal_reconcile_report_phantom Lambda Output
description: The output for the internal_reconcile_report_phantom Lambda.

jobId.description: The unique ID of the reconciliation job.

anotherPage.description: Indicates if more results can be retrieved on another page.

collectionId.description: Cumulus Collection ID value from the ORCA catalog.

granuleId.description: Cumulus granuleID value from the ORCA catalog.

filename.description: Filename of the object from the ORCA catalog.

key_path.description: key path and filename of the object in the ORCA catalog.

orcaEtag.description: etag of the object as reported in the ORCA catalog.

orcaLastUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds since 1 January 1970 UTC, that object was updated in the ORCA catalog.

orcaSize.description: Size in bytes of the object as reported in the ORCA catalog.
